price: 27. ¡Oh, creyentes!, no traicionen a Al-lah y a Su Mensajero ni violen a sabiendas lo que se les ha confiado (abandonando el cumplimiento de los mandatos de Al-lah).
arabic: يَٰٓأَيُّهَا ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ لَا تَخُونُواْ ٱللَّهَ وَٱلرَّسُولَ وَتَخُونُوٓاْ أَمَٰنَٰتِكُمۡ وَأَنتُمۡ تَعۡلَمُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: yāayyuhā alladhīna āmanū lā takhūnū al-laha wal-rasūla watakhūnū amānātikum wa-antum taʿlamūna
